title: Nuance Dragon Professional Individual v14.00.000.180 Incl Keymak
description:
Nuance Dragon Professional Individual v14.00.000.180 Incl Keymaker-CORE

The all-new Dragon Professional Individual drives productivity at work by enabling fast, accurate dictation and transcription with the right level of customization. Create, edit and format documents by voiceâ€”quickly and accuratelyâ€”so you spend less time on paperwork and more time on activities that boost the bottom line.
Top productivity features
Let Dragon work for you
Speed through documentation
Fast dictation and high recognition accuracy that continually improves as it adapts to your voice.
Dictate anytime, anywhere
Integrate with the professional-grade dictation app, Dragon Anywhere for iOS and Android (coming this fall) and dictate and edit documents wherever your job takes you.
Short-cut repetitive tasks
Define simple voice commands to short-cut repetitive processes, speed up document creation, and boost your productivity.
Boost efficiency
Add customized words for accurate recognition of the industry terms, acronyms or personal preferences you use very day.
System requirements
*Digital download
*Physical shipment
*RAM: Minimum 2 GB for 32-bit Windows 7, 8.1 & 10; 4 GB for 64-bit Windows 7, 8.1 & 10 and Windows Server 2008 R2 & 2012
*CPU: IntelÂ® dual core or equivalent AMD processor. Faster processors yield faster performance.
*Free hard disk space: 8GB
*Supported Operating Systems: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (32- and 64-bit); Windows Server 2008 R2 & 2012
*Internet Explorer 9 or higher or the current version of Chrome or Firefox for Online Help
*A sound card supporting 16-bit recording
*Built-in microphone or a Nuance-approved microphone. See support.nuance.com/compatibility for more information
*An Internet connection for product download and automatic product activation (a quick anonymous process)
